titlestmt.titleproper: RG 071:003, Department of Housing Planning Maps
titlestmt.subtitle: Inventory
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Todd M. Gabriel and Paul E. Baran.

publicationstmt.p: Copyright Â© 2007 by the Connecticut State Library

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Paul E. Baran on April 17, 2007

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: Town planning maps created through HUD's 701 Planning and Management Assistance Program.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) operated a Comprehensive Planning Assistance Grant program, also known as the 701 Planning and Management Assistance Program. Grants were awarded at the state, regional, and local level to improve housing and land use planning and management.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Maps of various types including zoning, base, land use, population density, traffic flow and volumes, utilities, neighborhoods, topopgraphy, community facilities, and buildable land, among others.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Alphabetical by town. Maps within towns are in no partcular order.

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.subject: City planning -- Connecticut -- maps
Connecticut. Dept. of Housing -- Records and correspondence
Connecticut. Dept. of Community Affairs -- Records and correspondence
Federal aid to community development
Zoning -- Connecticut -- maps

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: These records are stored at an off-site facility and therefore may not be available on a same-day basis.
